    words_string("One, two, three, four, five, six") == ["One", "two", "three", "four", "five", "six"]
    """
    # Init
    list_of_words = []
    index = 0
    # Iterate through each character of the string
    for char in s:
        # Loop on each character of the string
        while char!='' and char!= ',':
            # Append the current character to the words list
            list_of_words.append(char)
            # Increase the index
            index += 1
            # Get the next character of the string
            char = s[index]
        # Loop on the end of the string
        if index >= len(s):
            break
    return list_of_words
